info.title: SiaGraph API
info.description:
API documentation for the SiaGraph API.
This API version is still actively being extended, but changes to existing endpoints and their response layout should be minimal.

get.description: Fetch and compare metrics such as storage, hosts, revenue, and coin prices over a specified time period.

parameters.name: actual_date
parameters.description: Date to compare from in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: compare_date
parameters.description: Date to compare to in YYYY-MM-DD format.

30_day_revenue.description: 30-day revenue data by currency. Values are returned as strings to preserve precision.
Difference in 30-day revenue by currency. Values are returned as strings to preserve precision.

eur.description: Change in coin price in EUR.

usd.description: Change in coin price in USD.

sc.description: Change in coin price in SC.

400.description: Bad request. Possibly due to invalid date format.

get.description: Fetches metrics such as total storage, utilized storage, and active/total hosts.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start date for filtering metrics in ISO 8601 format.

date.description: The date and time of the metrics

total_storage.description: Total available storage across all hosts

total_hosts.description: Total number of hosts ever registered

get.description: Fetches daily aggregated network metrics such as blocks mined, contracts formed, and burned funds.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start date for filtering aggregates in ISO 8601 format.

get.description: Fetches the maximum used storage for each month grouped by the month.

200.description: Successful response with the grouped monthly max used storage data.

date.description: The first day of the month for which data is grouped.

max_used_storage.description: The maximum used storage value for the month in bytes.

default.summary: Example response showing three months of storage metrics

500.description: Internal server error. Query execution failed or another error occurred.

get.description: Fetches monthly revenue data from the external API, processes it to compute revenue differences, and returns the results.

200.description: Successful response with monthly revenue data and differences.

schema.description: Monthly revenue data with different currency representations

date.description: Year and month in YYYY-MM format

sc.description: Revenue in SiaCoin returned as a string to preserve precision

default.summary: Example response showing three months of revenue data

500.description: Error fetching or processing the data.

get.description: Fetches metrics related to consensus, block data, unconfirmed transactions, connected peers, and contracts from the Siacoin explorer.

200.description: Successful response with explorer metrics data.

blockHeight.description: The current block height in the Siacoin blockchain.

blockFoundTime.description: The timestamp when the block was found.

averageFoundSeconds.description: The average time in seconds taken to find a block.

estimatedV2Time.description: Estimated time when version 2 will be reached based on block height.

connectedPeers.description: The number of peers connected to the network.

newHosts.description: The number of new hosts detected in the last block.

completedContracts.description: The number of completed contracts in the last block.

newContracts.description: The number of new contracts detected in the last block.

unconfirmedTransactions.description: The number of unconfirmed transactions in the transaction pool.

500.description: Internal server error, failed to fetch data.

value.error: Error fetching data from Siacoin explorer.

get.description: Fetch host details, including settings, benchmark data, daily statistics, and scores.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the host.

parameters.name: public_key
parameters.description: The public key of the host.

first_seen.description: Timestamp when host was first seen

accepting_contracts.description: Whether host is accepting contracts (0 or 1)

country.description: Country code where host is located

used_storage.description: Amount of storage currently in use

contract_price.description: Base price for forming a contract

download_speed.description: Average download speed in bytes per second

upload_speed.description: Average upload speed in bytes per second

ttfb.description: Time to first byte in microseconds

used_storage.description: Storage in use on this date

total_storage.description: Total storage available on this date

accepting_contracts.description: Contract acceptance status on this date

contract_price.description: Average contract price in the segment

storage_price.description: Average storage price in the segment

upload_price.description: Average upload price in the segment

download_price.description: Average download price in the segment

used_storage.description: Average used storage in the segment

400.description: Bad request. Either host ID or public key must be provided.

404.description: No host found for the given parameters.

get.description: Fetch a list of hosts with sorting, filtering, and pagination options.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria for the hosts list. Possible values are: `rank`, `used_storage`, `total_storage`, `storage_price`, `net_address`, `age`, `growth`.

parameters.name: showinactive
parameters.description: Include inactive hosts if set to `true`.

parameters.name: acceptingContracts
parameters.description: Only include hosts that are currently accepting contracts if set to `true`.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Filter hosts by their net address. Case-insensitive partial match.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of hosts to return per page. Defaults to 15. Set to 0 for no limit.

parameters.name: maxContractPrice
parameters.description: Return hosts with a contract price less than or equal to this value (hastings).

parameters.name: maxStoragePrice
parameters.description: Return hosts with a storage price less than or equal to this value (hastings per byte per block).

parameters.name: maxUploadPrice
parameters.description: Return hosts with an upload price below this value (hastings per byte).

parameters.name: maxDownloadPrice
parameters.description: Return hosts with a download price below this value (hastings per byte).

200.description: Successful response with the hosts list and pagination details.

public_key.description: Public key of the host (ed25519 format).

storage_price.description: Price for storage in Siacoins per byte per block.

upload_price.description: Price for uploads in Siacoins per byte.

download_price.description: Price for downloads in Siacoins per byte.

country.description: Two-letter country code where the host is located.

accepting_contracts.description: Whether the host is currently accepting contracts (0 or 1).

total_score.description: Total benchmark score of the host.

used_storage_diff.description: Change in used storage compared to previous day in bytes.

rank.description: Rank of the host in the sorted list.

get.description: Retrieve a list of peers grouped by network type.

200.description: Successful response with the list of peers grouped by network.

mainnet.description: List of peers on the main Sia network.

last_scanned.description: Date when the peer was last scanned (YYYY-MM-DD format).

zen.description: List of peers on the Zen network.

last_scanned.description: Date when the peer was last scanned (YYYY-MM-DD format).

400.description: Invalid request or no data available.

get.description: Returns the largest renter storage totals (by utilized filesize) and aggregate totals. Data is derived from on-chain contract records and should be considered an estimate. The total sum may be different from the sum reported by Hosts.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of top renters to return. Defaults to 10.

largest_sizes.description: Largest renter utilized filesizes in bytes, sorted descending.

total_filesize.description: Sum of utilized filesize for all renters in bytes.

total_renters.description: Number of renters represented in the aggregation.

value.disclaimer: Based on blockchain contract data; values are estimates and not exact ground truth.
